_sText:
All credit goes to Aoki, the original map creator ([original submission](http://css.gamebanana.com/maps/135408 "")).

**Changes from the original**

- Fixed all invalid/missing textures.
- Fixed the crashes on stage 6, 9 and when spectating outside the map (bad displacements and sprites).
- Fixed a bad teleport destination in stage 2.
- Fixed the spikes on stage 9.
- Optimized the music (30mb less in size, no noticeable difference).
- All sprites are working.

Apart from that, the map remains unaltered.

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/iE-x-qfsIR0" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
